notes.note:
[Improved private browsing][1] windows block some web page elements that could track your web behavior across sites


  [1]: https://blog.mozilla.org/futurereleases/2015/08/14/new-experimental-private-browsing-and-add-ons-features-ready-for-pre-beta-testing-in-firefox/
Scan an URL from a QR code from the search panel
Family-friendly browsing for Android when users create a restricted profile on tablets
Mobile login manager (about:logins) lists all saved logins and allows users to view/edit or delete logins
Support direct voice input for searching from the URL bar
Use scrollable tabs for panels navigation
Improved performance on interactive websites that trigger a lot of restyles
Media Source Extension for HTML5 video available for all sites

[Remote website debugging][1] over WiFi (no USB cable or ADB needed)


  [1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Tools/Remote_Debugging/Debugging_Firefox_for_Android_over_Wifi
